title: Comic Book Writer Tom King
description:
Comic book writer Tom King talks about his work as a CIA agent, writing Batman and Catwoman's wedding and why his kids aren't impressed about his career in comics and the CIA.

Then, exclusively for the podcast, King talks to Late Night producer Henry Melcher and A Closer Look writer (and comics superfan) Sal Gentile about his work.
